verbs.description: PYONGYANG , North Korea ( AP ) - The news on television and the front page of the [V: ruling] [ARG0: Workers ' Party newspaper] was something North Koreans never would have imagined just months ago - their leader Kim Jong Un warmly shaking hands with President Donald Trump .
